title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for ValueSet R5-subscription-status-for-R4 from FHIR R5 to FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of concepts from ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/subscription-status|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
